title: Docker build fail
body_html:
When I try to build the Dockerfiles, they fail at this line

RUN git clone https://github.com/pytorch/vision.git && cd vision && pip install -v .

Here is the error returned:

pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-build-d_0hrixx/torch/

I tried manually inserting the packages from setup.py but it failed to load import torchvision after compiling

AWS ubuntu p2.xlarge w/ CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7, Nvidia 384.81
body_text:

RUN git clone https://github.com/pytorch/vision.git && cd vision && pip install -v .

Here is the error returned:
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-build-d_0hrixx/torch/

I tried manually inserting the packages from setup.py but it failed to load import torchvision after compiling
AWS ubuntu p2.xlarge w/ CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7, Nvidia 384.81
body:
When I try to build the Dockerfiles, they fail at this line 
```
RUN git clone https://github.com/pytorch/vision.git && cd vision && pip install -v .
```
Here is the error returned:

```
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/pip-build-d_0hrixx/torch/
```

I tried manually inserting the packages from setup.py but it failed to load import torchvision after compiling

AWS ubuntu p2.xlarge w/ CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7, Nvidia 384.81
